      • GOLButton

        public GOLButton(java.lang.String title,
                 java.lang.String name,
                 GOLController controller)
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the button which will be displayed on the button itself
        name - The identifier that you wish the button to be known by, not really necessary, but it makes for more understandable output

      • GOLButton

                 int y,

        x - The x-location in pixels of the upper left corner of the button
        y - The y-location in pixels of the upper left corner of the button
        title - The title of the button which will be displayed on the button itself
